Michael Vu

A real human bean

I'm a fifth-year undergraduate at UC Irvine studying computer science. I specialize in web development and shiny things.

I currently work on a campus-wide system for EEE @ UCI.

I'm an avid blues guitar player. My favorite guitar player is John Mayer, especially when he was still active with the Trio. I work on weekly guitar improvisations which may or may not suck.

Take a gander at my resume. Read through my terrible code on GitHub. Also, be sure to check out my blog while you're here!
